text: "I personally would like to extend my hand to Ms. Leal and offer her services through our organization. I do not want to see any more families destroyed at the hands of domestic violence and I do not want any more women to suffer like my daughter did. We are here to assist and we hope to hear from Ms. Leal."
title: Bobbi Kristina Brown’s ex-boyfriend Nick Gordon arrested for domestic violence in Florida

meta_data.description: Nick Gordon, the ex-boyfriend of Bobbi Kristina Brown, was arrested on domestic violence charges for the second time in one year Saturday.
